news_items.content: **Vijay Leads Protest Against Lock-Up Deaths Under DMK Rule**
Chennai residents are planning to launch a campaign to protect the Pallikaranai marshland from pollution risks. The area is under threat due to poor waste management and lack of enforcement.
The protesters demand apologies for 24 victims' families who lost their lives in lock-up deaths during the DMK rule. They also seek compensation for the families.
